title: NICE Clinical Guideline CG190: Pneumonia in adults
summary: Diagnosis and management of community- and hospital-acquired pneumonia, including severity assessment and antibiotic recommendations.

title: NICE Guideline NG136: Hypertension in adults
summary: Evidence-based recommendations on diagnosing and managing hypertension in adults, including thresholds and treatment strategies.

title: CDC Clinical Practice Guideline: Prescribing Opioids for Pain
summary: Recommendations for safe opioid prescribing in chronic pain management.

title: WHO: Clinical management of COVID-19
summary: Guidance for healthcare providers on assessment and management of COVID-19 patients.

title: NICE Guideline NG12: Suspected cancer recognition and referral
summary: Referral recommendations for suspected cancer based on symptom profiles and risk thresholds.
